meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0058.1 ::date 2012-12-14T09:17:39 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt After the collapse of Saddam Hussein 's dictatorial regime , Iraqi religious forces had entered a period of revitalization and expansion , # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0058_1.txt
sentence: After the collapse of Saddam Hussein 's dictatorial regime , Iraqi religious forces had entered a period of revitalization and expansion ,

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0058.2 ::date 2012-12-14T09:43:52 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Although the distribution system of the new legislative power in Iraq had generally taken care of the interests of all parties , and found a relatively reasonable balance point among all ethnic groups and sects -- otherwise a management committee , the interim constitution , and the current interim government would not have been successfully generated -- this does not mean that there were no contradictions among them . # ::save-date Fri Jan 5, 2018 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0058_2.txt
sentence: Although the distribution system of the new legislative power in Iraq had generally taken care of the interests of all parties , and found a relatively reasonable balance point among all ethnic groups and sects -- otherwise a management committee , the interim constitution , and the current interim government would not have been successfully generated -- this does not mean that there were no contradictions among them .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0058.3 ::date 2012-12-14T09:43:59 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt From an internal point of view , Shiites and Kurds tend to see eye to eye on the political and economic benefits , and Iraqi politics had almost become the arena of these two factions , # ::save-date Fri Jan 5, 2018 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0058_3.txt
sentence: From an internal point of view , Shiites and Kurds tend to see eye to eye on the political and economic benefits , and Iraqi politics had almost become the arena of these two factions ,

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0058.4 ::date 2012-12-14T09:44:11 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Although under the balance of interests some of Sunni political figures were involved in politics , what the Sunni radical groups were most concerned about was that the Shiites would turn around and suppress them in the future . # ::save-date Thu Nov 2, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0058_4.txt
sentence: Although under the balance of interests some of Sunni political figures were involved in politics , what the Sunni radical groups were most concerned about was that the Shiites would turn around and suppress them in the future .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0058.5 ::date 2012-12-10T11:14:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In February of this year , a radical Sunni organization attacked the Ali Mosque , which is the religious shrine of Shiite Muslims , and this led to the eruption of the conflict between Iraq 's two largest parties . # ::save-date Thu Nov 2, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0058_5.txt
sentence: In February of this year , a radical Sunni organization attacked the Ali Mosque , which is the religious shrine of Shiite Muslims , and this led to the eruption of the conflict between Iraq 's two largest parties .
